<Heading
  as={'h1'}
  className={'openapi__heading'}
  children={'getApiV1Snapshots:username:slug:snapshotIdPreview'}
></Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={'get'}
  path={'/api/v1/snapshots/{username}/{slug}/{snapshotId}/preview'}
  context={'endpoint'}
></MethodEndpoint>

Get a preview of the snapshot content

<Heading
  id={'request'}
  as={'h2'}
  className={'openapi-tabs__heading'}
  children={'Request'}
></Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[
    {
      schema: { type: 'string' },
      in: 'path',
      name: 'username',
      required: true,
    },
    { schema: { type: 'string' }, in: 'path', name: 'slug', required: true },
    {
      schema: { type: 'string' },
      in: 'path',
      name: 'snapshotId',
      required: true,
    },
  ]}
></ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema title={'Body'} body={undefined}></RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{
    '200': {
      description: 'Snapshot preview',
      content: {
        'application/json': {
          schema: {
            type: 'object',
            properties: {
              id: { type: 'string', example: 'snap-123' },
              documentId: { type: 'string', example: 'doc-456' },
              name: { type: 'string', example: 'Chapter 1 Draft' },
              description: {
                type: ['string', 'null'],
                example: 'First draft of chapter 1',
              },
              wordCount: { type: ['number', 'null'], example: 1250 },
              metadata: {
                type: ['object', 'null'],
                additionalProperties: {},
                example: { version: 1 },
              },
              createdAt: {
                type: 'string',
                format: 'date-time',
                example: '2023-01-01T00:00:00.000Z',
              },
              yDocState: { type: 'string', example: 'base64encodedstate...' },
              stateVector: {
                type: ['string', 'null'],
                example: 'base64vector...',
              },
            },
            required: ['id', 'documentId', 'name', 'createdAt', 'yDocState'],
            title: 'SnapshotWithContent',
          },
        },
      },
    },
    '401': {
      description: 'Not authenticated',
      content: {
        'application/json': {
          schema: {
            type: 'object',
            properties: {
              error: { type: 'string', example: 'An error occurred' },
            },
            required: ['error'],
            title: 'ErrorResponse',
          },
        },
      },
    },
    '403': {
      description: 'Access denied',
      content: {
        'application/json': {
          schema: {
            type: 'object',
            properties: {
              error: { type: 'string', example: 'An error occurred' },
            },
            required: ['error'],
            title: 'ErrorResponse',
          },
        },
      },
    },
    '404': {
      description: 'Project or snapshot not found',
      content: {
        'application/json': {
          schema: {
            type: 'object',
            properties: {
              error: { type: 'string', example: 'An error occurred' },
            },
            required: ['error'],
            title: 'ErrorResponse',
          },
        },
      },
    },
  }}
></StatusCodes>
